ne calling a friend in the area to go look.
 
 
 
 --- On Mon, 7/19/10, tri=
lobitegal <flexicalymenemeeki@ rocketmail. com> wrote:
 
 From: trilo=
bitegal <flexicalymenemeeki@ rocketmail. com>
 Subject: [EVP-ITC] An =
idea for RJ Experiment #3
 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
 Date: Monday, July=
 19, 2010, 11:11 AM
 
        =C2=A0                               RJ, if y=
ou live in or near a large city, like Denver, how about writing a number in=
 chalk on a public building where it won't be noticed right away, and can b=
e erased easily after the contest?  That way, any spirits could locate the =
building, post, bridge, or whatever, and see if they can see the chalk numb=
er or other symbol?  This might make it easier than trying to locate your h=
ome, with only an internet nickname to go by.  Just a thought.  
  
  
    =
